enchantment.description: ID of the enchantment of interest, e.g. `minecraft:protection`. If not set, amount of enchantments will be checked instead.
enchantment.markdownDescription: ID of the enchantment of interest, e.g. `minecraft:protection`. If not set, amount of enchantments will be checked instead.

comparison.description: How to compare the enchantment level, or the amount of enchantments, to the specified value.
comparison.markdownDescription: How to compare the enchantment level, or the amount of enchantments, to the specified value.

compare_to.description: Which value to compare the enchantment level or amount against.
compare_to.markdownDescription: Which value to compare the enchantment level or amount against.

type.description:
[Item Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/item_condition_types/enchantment)

Checks the level of a certain enchantment, or the amount of individual enchantments on the item.

Type ID: `origins:enchantment`
type.markdownDescription:
[Item Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/item_condition_types/enchantment)

Checks the level of a certain enchantment, or the amount of individual enchantments on the item.

Type ID: `origins:enchantment`
